format: A data frame with 1704 rows and 6 variables
reference: This data set is the same one found in the gapminder package in R as of 2020. This data set is used in the Fixed Effects chapter of The Effect.
description:
Description
The gapminder data contains data on life expectancy and GDP per capita by country and year.
title: Gapminder data

parameters.year: The year data was collected. Ranges from 1952 to 2007 in increments of 5 years
parameters.continent: The continent the country is in
parameters.lifeExp: Life expectancy at birth, in years
